Class EasterCalculator

java.lang.Object
dev.bjdelacruz.easter.EasterCalculator
public final class EasterCalculator extends Object
This class contains methods for calculating the date for Easter Sunday after 1582 AD and before 4100 AD. The earliest possible date for Easter Sunday is March 22, and the latest possible date is April 25.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    EasterCalculator.DateAfter4099Exception
    This exception should be thrown if a date comes after 4099 AD.
    static class 
    EasterCalculator.DateBefore1583Exception
    This exception should be thrown if a date comes before 1583 AD.
    static class 
    EasterCalculator.InvalidDateForEasterSundayException
    This exception should be thrown if a date that will be used to calculate the date for Easter Sunday is invalid.

  • Method Details

    • calculateEasterSundayForMonthDayAfter

      public static Optional<LocalDate> calculateEasterSundayForMonthDayAfter(Month month, int dayOfMonth, LocalDate afterDate)
      Finds the next date for Easter Sunday that falls on the given month and day after the given date. For example, the next time Easter Sunday will fall on March 31 after December 31, 2023, will be in the year 2024 AD.
      Parameters:
      month - A month, must be either March or April.
      dayOfMonth - A day in March or April.
      afterDate - The date after which to start looking for the next time Easter falls in month and on dayOfMonth.
      Returns:
      An optional that contains the date for the next time Easter falls on the given month and day.
      Throws:
      EasterCalculator.DateBefore1583Exception - if afterDate is before 1583 AD.
      EasterCalculator.DateAfter4099Exception - if afterDate is after 4099 AD.
      EasterCalculator.InvalidDateForEasterSundayException - if month and dayOfMonth represent a date that comes before March 22 or after April 25.

    • calculateEasterSundayForMonthDayAfter

      public static List<LocalDate> calculateEasterSundayForMonthDayAfter(Month month, int dayOfMonth, LocalDate afterDate, int count)
      Finds multiple dates for Easter Sunday that fall on the given month and day after the given date.
      Parameters:
      month - A month, must be either March or April.
      dayOfMonth - A day in March or April.
      afterDate - The date after which to start looking for the next time Easter falls in month and on dayOfMonth.
      count - The maximum number of dates to include in the list.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of dates, may be empty or contain fewer than count.
      Throws:
      EasterCalculator.DateBefore1583Exception - if afterDate is before 1583 AD.
      EasterCalculator.DateAfter4099Exception - if afterDate is after 4099 AD.
      EasterCalculator.InvalidDateForEasterSundayException - if month and dayOfMonth represent a date that precedes March 22, follows April 25, or is an invalid date.
      See Also:
      • calculateEasterSundayForMonthDayAfter(Month, int, LocalDate)

    • getPossibleEasterSundayDates

      public static List<LocalDate> getPossibleEasterSundayDates(int year)
      Returns a list of dates starting from March 22 of the given year to April 25 of the same year. These are the dates on which Easter Sunday may fall.
      Parameters:
      year - A year in the Gregorian calendar.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of possible dates for Easter Sunday.
      Throws:
      EasterCalculator.DateBefore1583Exception - if year is before 1583 AD.
      EasterCalculator.DateAfter4099Exception - if year is after 4099 AD.

    • calculateEasterSunday

      public static LocalDate calculateEasterSunday(int year)
      Returns the date of Easter Sunday for the given year. An exception is thrown if the year is before 1583 AD or after 4099 AD.
      Parameters:
      year - A year in the Gregorian calendar
      Returns:
      The date of Easter Sunday for the given year
      Throws:
      EasterCalculator.DateBefore1583Exception - if year is before 1583 AD.
      EasterCalculator.DateAfter4099Exception - if year is after 4099 AD.
